#text=Adventures By Train It was a Saturday and I felt like going on an adventure .
#text=I decided to drive a couple of hours away from home to this place that has an old-fashioned train that people can ride .
#text=It takes you along a river and into a wooded area where you can scenery and historical markers that you ca n't get to by car .
#text=I paid the fare and got on the train .
#text=I sat by a window where I would have a great view of the scenery .
#text=As the train got moving , I was glad that I had decided to ride this train .
#text=The scenery was amazing and I saw and learned information about historical markers that I had not known before .
#text=It was a fun day and I hated to see the train ride end when it did .
#text=I started out for home but new I would be back again someday to take this train ride again .
